info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 11 at 7:12PM PDT until June 11 at 8:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM MST/830 PM PDT/ THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN MOHAVE, SAN BERNARDINO AND SOUTH CENTRAL CLARK COUNTIES... At 712 PM MST /712 PM PDT/, Doppler radar indicated that thunderstorms with heavy rain had moved away from Laughlin and Bullhead City. However, additional rain was moving into the area, and runoff from earlier storms may still be flowing toward the river. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Bullhead City, Laughlin, Katherine Landing, Big Bend Rec Area, Mesquite Creek, Mojave Ranch Estates, Mohave Valley, Oatman and Willow Valley. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
